meanings.sent1: The young rethinker asked many questions to understand better.
meanings.sent2: The team of rethinkers gathered to brainstorm new ideas.

meanings.sent5: The little rethinker's imagination knew no bounds as he explored different possibilities.

meanings.sent1: After some reflection, the rethinker decided to change his approach.

meanings.sent3: The sudden rain forced a quick rethinker of the outdoor picnic.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, adaptability is key for any successful rethinker.
